Volunteer Coordinator: Jeff Topham, Volunteer Coordinator; Phone: 250.833.4096; Email: vca2@rootsandblues.ca
Service Details: - Presents the annual ROOTS&BLUES festival the third weekend of every August- Encourages and promotes performers from all parts of the world with special emphasis on Canadian talent- Offers outreach that includes financial scholarship award program for graduating School District No. 83 students- Donates tickets to charities, community groups, schools, and not-for-profits- Offers equipment loans and partners with local not-for-profits- Supports other non-profit and fundraising groups by offering festival booths at no charge- Mentors youth through our student documentary program and volunteer office- Offers free admission to the festival to all children age 12 and under
